name: world of dark
description: This is a very fun shooting game, hoping to bring glory to the country? Hope to slam hard? Hope to become the god of basketball? Turning the tide with one enemy against five is no longer a dream! On the basketball court, gallop on the court, do as you please, let you make the decision. The goal in this game is simple: to master your shooting skills like a professional player. Bounce the ball on the playground or in the air and shoot it into the basket. You must score in a series of layups. Adopting the familiar animation style of players, coupled with realistic style special effects, it achieves a visual effect with a strong sense of presence. The performance method pays great attention to every frame of popular characters.
